analysis.description:
EthFlipper.sendFunds (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol#459-465) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol#460-465)

EthFlipper.requireCorrectReceipt (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol#563-622) is declared view but contains assembly code
EthFlipper.memcpy (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code
mask in EthFlipper.placeBet (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol#245) is a local variable never initialiazed
Parameter '_nextOwner' of EthFlipper.approveNextOwner (/unique_chucks/20/0x3cf4b3ec129d2e44514b90e07f13acf8fe22e217.sol#142-145) is not in mixedCase
